title: 30 min Beginner Yoga - Full Body Yoga Stretch No Props Needed
description:
A beginner yoga sequence to build strength and improve flexibility. No props needed!
💎 PRODUCT LAUNCH 💎 AFFIRMATION CARDS + YOGA JOURNAL 👉 https://bit.ly/ywkshop
❤️ NEW MOBILE APP ❤️ FREE TO DOWNLOAD📲 👉 http://bit.ly/ytmobileapp

Hi friends, this week I'm offering you a 30 minute practice perfect for beginners! Now just because a class is for beginners, doesn't mean it isn't challenging! We are going to work on building foundational strength, balance and flexibility. The great thing about this practice is that there are no props necessary and it's great for all experience levels.

If you're new to yoga, remember that the most important thing is to stay focused on your breath. Don't worry if you don't get all the poses correctly or if you need to take a break. Be patient with yourself, do what you can and remember to relax. This is a wonderful class to alleviate stress and anxiety.

✅ SUBSCRIBE TO SUPPORT FREE YOGA ON THE INTERNET  http://bit.ly/ywkassandra
🔔 Don’t forget to click on the bell to turn on post notifications!

Thanks for watching,
Kassandra

comments: I’ve been doing yoga for 30 years.  You are the most in tuned teacher I’ve ever come across.  You have an absolute gift and emit the most gentle and accepting energy.  I’m so grateful for your classes.  Absolutely wonderful.  Thank you xoxo

Can I just say how awesome this is? My daughter has PE as a class and she’s required to exercise for 30 minutes a day. I’ve decided to do it with her so I can lose weight and gain some more confidence. We had SO much fun doing this together. We giggled as things we couldn’t do and congratulated on things we could do. We are excited (well I am) to do it again tomorrow! After we get good at this, we will try another video!

I’m not a beginner. I did yoga almost everyday for 2.5 years after finding this channel. 2023 brought me a break up, a job shift, and a whole dark-night-of-the-soul experience. I stopped doing yoga all together. It feels strange to come back to a beginner class but this also feels like exactly the place I need to start. Your message at the end reaffirmed this! Thank you for this class ❤

I don't realize how much my body is tense and how much i hold my breath until you say, "Relax your head and shoulders..take a deep breath in" etc. Thanks! It really helps me when you tell us to relax and breathe!

This video changed my life! I started 10 weeks ago…I only made it 16 minutes the fist time trying. Ten weeks later I can do this plus a 10 min energize practice in the morning and do another 30 minute evening practice before bed. I’m 52 years old and had rotator cuff and back surgery less than 2 years ago and never thought I gain any strength or flexibility back. You are patient and kind and an amazing instructor. You encouraged me to just keep trying. I’m far from anything beyond a beginner but I’m farther than I’d ever thought I’d be. Thank you so much! I encourage everyone to subscribe and follow. Work all the beginner practices until you find the style and routines you like. You won’t be sorry :)
